视频模板

<!-- 定义一个遮罩层，当点击视频区域时显示，点击遮罩层关闭视频 -->
<style>
    /* 视频弹出时的遮罩层 */
    .overlay {
        display: none;
        position: fixed;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
        z-index: 999;
    }

    /* 显示视频的样式 */
    .overlay:target {
        display: block;
    }

.overlay-content {
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
    width: 80%;
    max-width: 800px;
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); /* 半透明白色 */
    padding: 10px;
}


    /* 视频全屏播放 */
    .overlay video {
        width: 100%;
        height: auto;
    }

    /* 点击空白部分时关闭 */
    .overlay:target .overlay-content {
        animation: fadeIn 0.5s ease-in;
    }

    /* 关闭按钮 */
    .close {
        position: absolute;
        top: 10px;
        right: 15px;
        font-size: 24px;
        color: white;
        text-decoration: none;
        z-index: 1000;
    }
</style>

<!-- 原有元素 -->
<div class="album-item-select-wrapper" style="left:152px;top:0px">
    <div id="album-media-message-6495" class="media-inner dark interactive" style="height:177px;width:312px;left:0px;top:0px">
        <!-- 点击播放链接指向#video1，触发弹出层显示 -->
        <a href="#video1">
            <video autoplay="" src="./img/qiangdeng4.mp4" class="full-media" loop="" playsinline="" draggable="true"></video>
            <img class="thumbnail opacity-transition slow not-open not-shown" alt="" draggable="true" src="file:///C:/img/qiangdeng3.jpg">
            <i class="icon icon-large-play opacity-transition fast not-shown not-open"></i>
        </a>
        <div class="message-media-duration">0:07</div>
    </div>
</div>

<!-- 弹出的视频层 -->
<div id="video1" class="overlay">
    <a href="#" class="close">&times;</a> <!-- 关闭按钮 -->
    <div class="overlay-content">
        <video controls>
            <source src="./1.mp4" type="video/mp4">
            Your browser does not support the video tag.
        </video>
    </div>
</div>

图片模板


<!-- 定义一个遮罩层，当点击图片区域时显示，点击遮罩层关闭图片 -->
<style>
    /* 图片弹出时的遮罩层 */
    .overlay {
        display: none;
        position: fixed;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
        z-index: 999;
    }

    /* 显示图片的样式 */
    .overlay:target {
        display: block;
    }

    .overlay-content {
        position: absolute;
        top: 50%;
        left: 50%;
        transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
        width: 80%;
        max-width: 800px;
		background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); /* 半透明白色 */
        padding: 10px;
    }

    /* 图片弹出后的样式 */
    .overlay img {
        width: 100%;
        height: auto;
    }

    /* 点击空白部分时关闭 */
    .overlay:target .overlay-content {
        animation: fadeIn 0.5s ease-in;
    }

    /* 关闭按钮 */
    .close {
        position: absolute;
        top: 10px;
        right: 15px;
        font-size: 24px;
        color: white;
        text-decoration: none;
        z-index: 1000;
    }
</style>

<!-- 原有元素 -->
<div class="album-item-select-wrapper" style="left:0px; top:0px">
    <div id="album-media-message-6495" class="media-inner dark interactive" style="height:177px;width:312px;left:0px;top:0px">
        <!-- 点击播放链接指向#image1，触发弹出层显示 -->

		<a href="#gehu3" style="display: inline-block; position: relative;">
			<img src="./人工查询样板间_files/gehu3.jpg" class="full-media" alt="" draggable="true">
			<i class="icon icon-large-play opacity-transition fast not-shown not-open" style="position: absolute; top: 50%; left: 50%; transform: translate(-50%, -50%);"></i>
		</a>

    </div>
</div>

<!-- 弹出的图片层 -->
<div id="gehu3" class="overlay">
    <a href="#" class="close">&times;</a> <!-- 关闭按钮 -->
    <div class="overlay-content">
        <img src="./img/gehu3.jpg" alt="Large Image">
    </div>
</div>
